entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
